Package org.daisy.dotify.formatter.impl.core

Interface BlockGroup

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlockSequence, ContentCollectionImpl, FormatterCoreImpl, TableOfContentsImpl
    public interface BlockGroup
    Provides an interface for blocks in a dynamic sequence whose inclusion depend on the occurrence of dynamic contents.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      List<Block> getBlocks​(FormatterContext context, DefaultContext c, CrossReferenceHandler crh)
      Gets the list of blocks with the specified context.
      boolean isGenerated()
      Returns true if these blocks are dynamic.

    • Method Detail

      • getBlocks

        List<Block> getBlocks​(FormatterContext context,
                      DefaultContext c,
                      CrossReferenceHandler crh)
        Gets the list of blocks with the specified context.
        Parameters:
        context - the formatter context
        c - the book context
        crh - the cross reference handler
        Returns:
        returns a list of blocks

      • isGenerated

        boolean isGenerated()
        Returns true if these blocks are dynamic.
        Returns:
        returns true if the blocks are dynamically generated, false otherwise.
